bibl.title: G.M. Browne and J.C. Shelton, Nag Hammadi Codices. Greek and Coptic Papyri from the Cartonnage of the Covers. (The Coptic Gnostic Library. Nag Hammadi Studies. XVI.)
bibl.note: P. Nag Hammadi. - Part One: Greek Papyri [Codices I , IV, V, VI, VII, VIII, IX, XI]. Part Two: Coptic Papyri [Codices I, VII, VIII].
